attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Annuities.Class Annuities as Savings, many Pensioners have taken out Annuities to help them Live when they Retire, as the State Pension alone will not be Sufficient to provide enough Money to give a Reasonable Standard of Living. Surely Tax has already been paid on the Income that has been used to pay for an Annuity however,PENSIONERS are PENALISED when their Income is ASSCESED when applying for Relief of COMMUNITY CHARGE and/or INCOME SUPPORT. Because they have been PRUDENT and Saved for their Annuity.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
